
```{r}
library(stringr)
library(lubridate)
民國年月<-c("099/01","099/02","099/03")

# 1
str_c("1",民國年月,"/01")->民國年月

# 2
lubridate::ymd(民國年月) -> 民國年月

# 3
民國年月 + years(911)
```

```{r}
民國年月<-c("099/01","099/02","099/03")

library(dplyr)
# 1
民國年月 %>% 
  str_c("1", . ,"/01") %>%
  ymd %>%
  { . + years(911) }
```
